responses: Hello! How can I help you with your college queries?

patterns: When is the last date to pay fees?
responses: The last date to pay fees is April 30th, 2025.
Semester exams will start from May 15th, 2025. Timetable will be shared soon.

patterns: Who is the HOD of CSE?
responses: Dr. R. Kumar is the current Head of the CSE Department.
Goodbye! Feel free to ask more questions anytime.
